Package iot.networkentity

Class Mote

java.lang.Object
iot.networkentity.NetworkEntity
iot.networkentity.Mote
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
UserMote
public class Mote
extends NetworkEntity
A class representing the energy bound and moving motes in the network.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Mote

      @Raw public Mote​(long DevEUI, int xPos, int yPos, int transmissionPower, int SF, java.util.List<MoteSensor> moteSensors, int energyLevel, Path path, double movementSpeed, int startMovementOffset, int periodSendingPacket, int startSendingOffset, Environment environment)
      A constructor generating a node with a given x-coordinate, y-coordinate, environment, transmitting power spreading factor, list of MoteSensors, energy level, connection, sampling rate, movement speed and start offset.
      Parameters:
      DevEUI - The device's unique identifier
      xPos - The x-coordinate of the node.
      yPos - The y-coordinate of the node.
      SF - The spreading factor of the node.
      transmissionPower - The transmitting power of the node.
      moteSensors - The mote sensors for this mote.
      energyLevel - The energy level for this mote.
      path - The path for this mote to follow.
      movementSpeed - The movement speed of this mote.
      startMovementOffset - The start offset of this mote (in seconds).
      periodSendingPacket - period to define how many seconds the mote has to send a packet (in seconds)
      startSendingOffset - time to await before send the first packet (in seconds)

    • Mote

      @Raw public Mote​(long DevEUI, int xPos, int yPos, int transmissionPower, int SF, java.util.List<MoteSensor> moteSensors, int energyLevel, Path path, double movementSpeed, Environment environment)
      A constructor generating a node with a given x-coordinate, y-coordinate, environment, transmitting power spreading factor, list of MoteSensors, energy level, connection, sampling rate and movement speed and random start offset.
      Parameters:
      DevEUI - The device's unique identifier
      xPos - The x-coordinate of the node.
      yPos - The y-coordinate of the node.
      SF - The spreading factor of the node.
      transmissionPower - The transmitting power of the node.
      moteSensors - The mote sensors for this mote.
      energyLevel - The energy level for this mote.
      path - The path for this mote to follow.
      movementSpeed - The movement speed of this mote.
